Subject: Social Media for Writers
Description: What social media trends are necessary for the writer building their web foot print? What are some important things to do, and what should you not do?  Speakers include:David Erik Nelson, Michael W. Lucas, Christopher Purrett, Alex Kourvo, Mark Oshiro, Mary Lynne Gibbs - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Pupal Writers Panel
Description: You've written a bit, you've published a bit, now what?  Speakers include:Jen Haeger, Christian Klaver, Ken MacGregor, Christopher Purrett, Janice Leach - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Reading/Signing: Christopher Purrett and Merrie Haskell
Description: Join our attending authors in the Writers Block (317 & 318) for readings and signings!  Speakers include:Christopher Purrett, Merrie Haskell - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes

Subject: Self-Publishing 2016
Description: This panel discusses today's self-publishing options and business models. Our panelists include authors who are both self- and traditionally published, in fiction and nonfiction, including people who are making an income entirely by self-publishing. We'll discuss why we made the choice to self-publish, the pitfalls and lessons learned, and which business choices we've made on our respective self-publishing efforts.  Speakers include:Michael W. Lucas, Jen Haeger, Christopher Purrett, Alex Kourvo, Robert Kroese - Track: Literature  - Duration: 50 minutes
